attributes.action: give secondary school pupils the choice of studying religious education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Athiest pupils are being forced to study something they dont follow or believe in. whilst other strictly religious pupils can be taken out of lessons based on other religions that they do not follow or Gods they do not believe in. Why should pupils who dont believe in any God or follow any religion have to take part in these lessons?

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
